title: Service disruption on the East-West Line

updates.text: 11.20pm: EWL - Due to a signalling fault, there are no train services between Aljunied and Tanah Merah stations. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between Aljunied and Tanah Merah stations. Passengers are advised to take the Thomson-East Coast Line, Circle Line, and Downtown Line to continue their journey.

11.07pm: EWL - Due to a signalling fault, please add 20 minutes of additional travelling time between Aljunied and Tanah Merah stations. Free regular bus services are available between Aljunied and Tanah Merah stations.
